abstract: National Opinion Research Center at University of Chicago releases study of 1,509 adults that offers one of most comprehensive look at Americans' beliefs about obesity; findings show large majority of people believe obesity is biggest health threat in nation, along with cancer, and that condition results from lack of willpower; survey shows outdated notions about obesity still persists.

headline.print_headline: Many Wrong on Causes  of Obesity, Study Finds
headline.main: Americans Blame Obesity on Willpower, Despite Evidence It’s Genetic

snippet: Three-quarters of participants in a new study said obese people should exercise more and eat better, even though science says it’s more complicated than that....
lead_paragraph: Three-quarters of participants in a new study said obese people should exercise more and eat better, even though science says it’s more complicated than that.
